languages.text:
The Cyber-Eagle deals its weapon damage to all enemies around it, provoking AGI Save -{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19}. On a failure, they are {g|f:327db128df8b4ed5ad90fa64c3e413a9}Blinded{/g} for 1 round..
Available only if the Cyber-Eagle is not {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Ascended{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The Cyber-Eagle deals its weapon damage to all enemies around it, provoking AGI Save -{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19}. On a failure, they are {g|f:327db128df8b4ed5ad90fa64c3e413a9}Blinded{/g} for 1 round..
Available only if the Cyber-Eagle is not {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Ascended{/g}.

languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell and deals its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Надзиратель{/g} выбирает свободную клетку в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g}. Киберорел перемещается туда и наносит урон от оружия всем врагам на соседних клетках, не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}. Эти враги совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослеплены{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Overseer selects an unoccupied cell in their line of sight. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell and deals its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking attacks of opportunity. Those enemies must pass an Agility resistance test with a −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} penalty or become blinded for 1 round. Then, the cyber-eagle begins {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell and deals its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell and deals its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattı{/g} içinde boş bir hücre seçer. Siber kartal, o hücreye doğru ilerler ve bitişikteki tüm düşmanlara kullandığı silahın hasarını verir. Bu esnada {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez. Bu düşmanlar −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}körleşirler{/g}. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell and deals its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Gözetmen, görüş hattı içinde boş bir hücre seçer. Siber kartal, o hücreye doğru ilerler ve bitişikteki tüm düşmanlara kullandığı silahın hasarını verir. Bu esnada fırsat saldırılarını tetiklemez. Bu düşmanlar −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} ceza puanına sahip bir Çeviklik direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde körleşirler. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer. Ardından da siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeye{/g} başlar.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, görüş hattı içinde boş bir hücre seçer. Siber kartal, o hücreye doğru ilerler ve bitişikteki tüm düşmanlara kullandığı silahın hasarını verir. Bu esnada fırsat saldırılarını tetiklemez. Bu düşmanlar −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde körleşirler. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Ardından da siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeye{/g} başlar.

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} sélectionne une case inoccupée dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}. Le cyber-aigle se place sur cette case et inflige les dégâts de son arme à tous les ennemis adjacents, sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. Les cibles doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19}, sans quoi elles sont {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}aveuglées{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell and deals its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le surveillant sélectionne une case inoccupée dans sa ligne de mire. Le cyber-aigle se place sur cette case et inflige les dégâts de son arme à tous les ennemis adjacents, sans provoquer d'attaques d'opportunité. Les cibles doivent réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité avec une pénalité de −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19}, sans quoi elles sont aveuglées pendant 1 round. Le cyber-aigle prend ensuite son {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}envol{/g}.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} wählt ein unbesetztes Feld in seinem {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtfeld{/g}. Der Cyber-Adler bewegt sich zu diesem Feld und verursacht seinen Waffenschaden bei allen angrenzenden Gegnern, ohne {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} zu provozieren. Diese Gegner müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem Abzug von −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} bestehen, sonst werden sie 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell and deals its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Aufseher wählt ein unbesetztes Feld in seinem Sichtfeld. Der Cyber-Adler bewegt sich zu diesem Feld und verursacht seinen Waffenschaden bei allen angrenzenden Gegnern, ohne Gelegenheitsangriffe zu provozieren. Diese Gegner müssen eine Widerstandsprobe auf Beweglichkeit mit einem Abzug von −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} bestehen, sonst werden sie 1 Runde lang geblendet. Anschließend beginnt der Cyber-Adler, {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}aufzusteigen{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督者{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線{/g}の中の空いているセルを選択する。サイバーイーグルがそのセルに移動すると、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を引き起こすことなく、隣接するすべての敵に武器ダメージを与える。これらの敵は−{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19}のペナルティで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g} を受けなければならず、失敗すると1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}になる。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell and deals its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 監督者は、視線の中の空いているセルを選択する。サイバーイーグルがそのセルに移動すると、機会攻撃を引き起こすことなく、隣接するすべての敵に武器ダメージを与える。これらの敵は−{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19}のペナルティで敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると1ラウンドの間盲目になる。それから、サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}を開始する。

監督者は、視線の中の空いているセルを選択する。サイバーイーグルがそのセルに移動すると、機会攻撃を引き起こすことなく、隣接するすべての敵に武器ダメージを与える。これらの敵は−{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19}のペナルティで敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると1ラウンドの間盲目になる。それから、サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}を開始する。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Надзиратель{/g} выбирает свободную клетку в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g}. Киберорел перемещается туда и наносит урон от оружия всем врагам на соседних клетках, не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}. Эти враги совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослеплены{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell and deals its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Надзиратель выбирает свободную клетку в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g}. Киберорел перемещается туда и наносит урон от оружия всем врагам на соседних клетках, не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}. Эти враги совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослеплены{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

Надзиратель выбирает свободную клетку в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g}. Киберорел перемещается туда и наносит урон от оружия всем врагам на соседних клетках, не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}. Эти враги совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослеплены{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}选择{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内一个未被占据的格子，生化猎鹰会移动至目标格子，对所有邻近敌人造成武器伤害。生化猎鹰的移动不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。所有受到攻击的敌人都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19}减值，否则就会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell and deals its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 监察官选择视线范围内一个未被占据的格子，生化猎鹰会移动至目标格子，对所有邻近敌人造成武器伤害。生化猎鹰的移动不会触发借机攻击。所有受到攻击的敌人都需要进行敏捷抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19}减值，否则就会陷入致盲状态，持续一轮。随后，生化猎鹰进入{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} selecciona una casilla libre en su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g}. La ciberáguila se mueve a esa casilla e inflige el doble de su daño de arma a todos los enemigos adyacentes sin provocar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}. Los enemigos deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegados{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle moves to that cell and deals its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El supervisor selecciona una casilla libre en su línea de visión. La ciberáguila se mueve a esa casilla e inflige el doble de su daño de arma a todos los enemigos adyacentes sin provocar ataques de oportunidad. Los enemigos deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Agilidad con una penalización de −{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} o quedar cegados durante 1 asalto. Después, la ciberáguila {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}se eleva{/g}.

El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} selecciona una casilla desocupada en su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g}. El águila cibernética se mueve a esa celda e inflige su daño de arma a todos los enemigos adyacentes sin provocar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}. Esos enemigos deben superar una prueba de resistencia de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una penalización de -{uip|PetsAGI|40bc0f9310894ee2ace0d60daafa3c19} o quedar ciegos durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. A continuación, el águila cibernética comienza a remontar el vuelo {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}{/g} .
